about_the_game:
It’s time to embark on a journey of self-discovery, love, and parenthood. In this romantic slice-of-life adventure, you'll step into the shoes of a brave protagonist starting a new life in the vibrant town of Lemontown.

When Life Gives You Lemons is an engaging and heartwarming 300,000-word romantic slice-of-life interactive novel by C.C. Hill, where your choices control the story. The game is text-based, with optional character artwork that you can toggle on and off.

Manage your finances wisely as you strive to build a stable life for yourself and your child.
Explore life in a new town, make fun or strategic decisions, and witness the consequences unfold as you shape your character's destiny.

Romance is a central theme, and your heart will be pulled in different directions as you experience the thrill of flirting and building relationships. Engage in heart-to-heart conversations, share intimate moments, and let love blossom organically. The game offers a diverse range of romantic possibilities, allowing you to choose between passionate hookups, reigniting old flames, or finding a genuine connection with someone new.

  • Play as cis, trans, or nonbinary; gay, straight, bi, ace, or aromantic.
  • Fully customize your character.
  • Enjoy family time and bonding with your young child or sibling: you get to fully customize the child’s appearance.
  • Keep track of your finances.
  • Pay your bills or go into debt.
  • Renovate your house.
  • Excel at your job and get promoted.
  • Make fun decisions for your child; including interviewing their new babysitter.
  • Partake in fun activities with your child.
  • Engage in hookups, flirt with everyone, or remain single.

Embrace the messiness of life, and let love guide you as you explore the unique possibilities that Lemontown has to offer.
